attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people of this country have such short memories so it would be a great to hear you mr. blair make more of an issue and remind the population about the real sleaze under the tory government. please sir dont let them back in. i think you are the best thing that has happend to this country in such a long time.

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call for action, not just your name. There is also party political material in the body of the petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
